#ffffff"},"fontSize":12,"fontFamily":"Arial","fontWeight":"bold"},"groupHeaderStyle":{"&:not(:empty)":{"backgroundColor":"#e4e8ed","textTransform":"uppercase","fontWeight":"bold","color":"#878e94","fontFamily":"Arial","fontSize":12,"boxShadow":"inset #ffffff"}},"rowSelectedStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#e4e8ed"},"inputStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#ffffff","color":"#878e94"},"searchInputStyle":{"fontSize":"14px","textTransform":"uppercase","backgroundColor":"#ffffff","color":"#878e94","&:focus":{"color":"#878e94"}},"selectStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#073c57","color":"#ffffff","borderColor":"#ffffff","outlineColor":"#ffffff"},"paginationStyle":{"textTransform":"uppercase","fontSize":"15px"},"pageButtonStyle":{"textTransform":"uppercase","fontSize":"15px","backgroundColor":"#ffffff","color":"#164861","&:hover":{"backgroundColor":"#052c3f","color":"#ffffff"}},"pageButtonHoverStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#052c3f","color":"#ffffff"},"pageButtonActiveStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#073c57","color":"#ffffff"},"pageButtonCurrentStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#073c57","color":"#ffffff"}},"dataKey":"3e13d2e9ca35cb29f5557333972decc2","key":"3e13d2e9ca35cb29f5557333972decc2"},"children":[]},"class":"reactR_markup"},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
Glossary
Abbreviations used in table:
METAL: MEdian Time Average Lead.
Median of time average leads for each game played by a team.

TAL: Time Average Lead
Unadjusted time average lead for regular season games played
At any give point in regulation of 2021, team __ led by an average of __ points.


SOS: Strength of Schedule
Opponent quality adjustment based on opponents’ average TAL of opponents time average lead
Does not consider games against team of interest
E.g., SOS calculation for HOU does not include the games played against HOU


TALE: Time Average Lead Evaluation
Season time average lead with adjustment for opponent quality
TALE = TAL + SOS

MOV: Margin of Victory (convention used by Pro Football Reference)
Aggregate point differential for team, on per game basis
MOV = (Season Points Scored - Season Points Allowed)/Games Played

articles.title: Casey (left)
articles.description: Why your time is likely better spent elsewhere
articles.contents:
The Latest Numbers
          
          
          Home
          About
          2021 NFL Time Average Ranks
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Casey (left)
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Content
            This blog might well contain explorations of sports questions using data. WARNING: I’m an amateur in every sense applicable. I’ve always liked sports and math. My expertise, if existent, is in the area of nuclear power plant operations. Baseball was my first love. With less disposable time, I’ve drifted to the NFL. I’ve lived most of my life in southwestern PA. Therefore, I’m an honest-to-goodness Pirates fan that also likes the Steelers and Penguins. I didn’t write a line of code from 2007 until 2019, when I was introduced to R and the tidyverse. This blog contains byproducts of my attempts at learning.
            
            
            Blog Name
            This blog’s title is a hat tip to the band toe. I’m indebted to the YouTube algorithm for the introduction. If you’re reading this, a better use of your time would be to check them out here.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Casey (left)

I’ve lived most of my life in southwestern PA. Therefore, I’m an honest-to-goodness Pirates fan that also likes the Steelers and Penguins. I didn’t write a line of code from 2007 until 2019, when I was introduced to R and the tidyverse. This blog contains byproducts of my attempts at learning.
